name: Sliding through life
description:
Sid lived in a Van with his buddy Jeff. I let them stay over once and they never left. Jeff smoked bongs and Sid played Zelda

A short series - 3/10.

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent feature film. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

Official trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

Director: S.C. Wilson
DOP: Viktor Wallmark
